Map by ub admuns & friends.Translation: Map by ub admuns & friends, EN Translation: Allenw @ Ozlin server

第零章 向乐欲之所瓯博讷修道院出发!(热身回合).Translation: Chapter Zero: Departing for the Abbey of Pleasure in Orbonne! (Warm-up Round)

第一章 初探乐欲之所瓯博讷修道院!.Translation: Chapter One: Initial Exploration of the Abbey of Pleasure in Orbonne!

通往山谷外的道路30s后开放.Translation: The road to the valley will open in 30 seconds.

这是!?看来没错了...这里就是传说中的乐欲之所瓯博讷修道院了.Translation: Is this!? It seems correct... This is the legendary Abbey of Pleasure in Orbonne.

可恶!通往桥面的路被神秘力量封锁了,需要15s破解.Translation: Damn! The road to the bridge is blocked by a mysterious force, it will take 15 seconds to unlock.

进入瓯博讷修道院的入口将于20s后开放.Translation: The entrance to the Abbey of Orbonne will open in 20 seconds.

这建筑不像是自然生成在这与世隔绝的密林深处,看来已经荒废许久了,四周一片寂寥静默.Translation: This building doesn't seem to be naturally formed in this secluded forest; it appears to have been abandoned for a long time. The surrounding silence is chilling...

两侧的道路被未知的能量封锁了,看来有一股神秘的力量在干涉我们,貌似只能去一探究竟.Translation: The roads on both sides are blocked by unknown energy. It seems a mysterious force is interfering with us; we have no choice but to investigate...

我们需要15s时间来架设传送阵.Translation: We need 15 seconds to set up the teleportation array.

机工士-我是姆斯塔迪奥，想继续前进，要先过我这关！.Translation: Mechanic: I am Mustadio. If you want to proceed, you must get past me first!

机工士-这点小问题我分分钟就能修好!.Translation: Mechanic: I can fix this little problem in no time!

机工士-有两下子啊……但是你能抵挡住这个吗？！.Translation: Mechanic: Impressive, huh... But can you withstand this?!

(不好！我们的弱点已被看穿，避免跟他对视，以防被找到弱点击破！).Translation: (Oh no! Our weakness has been exposed, avoid making eye contact to prevent being found out!)

机工士-电能激荡充能中.Translation: Mechanic: Electrical energy surging during charging.

机工士-制导飞弹已发射.Translation: Mechanic: Guided missile has been launched.

机工士-左右双舷扫射充能中....Translation: Mechanic: Port and starboard broadside attack charging...

机工士-电能聚焦充能中.Translation: Mechanic: Electrical energy focusing during charging.

机工士-右左双舷扫射充能中....Translation: Mechanic: Right and left broadside attack charging...

机工士-永远的旅行…终于…结束了…谢谢你…黄道勇士….Translation: Mechanic: The eternal journey... finally... it's over... Thank you... Zodiac Warrior...

干得好，我们已击败机工士-姆斯塔迪奥，接下来继续前进吧！.Translation: Well done, we have defeated Mechanic Mustadio, let's continue forward!

深入瓯博讷修道院的入口将于20s后开放.Translation: The entrance to the Abbey of Orbonne will open in 20 seconds.

历尽沧桑的腐朽建筑上依稀能辨出试炼之间几字...看来这或许是迷宫深处的出口?不过.Translation: On the decayed building, faint traces of the trials can be seen... Could this be the exit deep within the labyrinth? But with the arrow drawn, there's no turning back...

我们需要20s破解此处的守护魔法,坚持住!.Translation: We need 20 seconds to break the protective magic here, hold on!

女妖-桀桀...让我夺走你的灵魂....Translation: Witch: Hehehe... Let me take your soul...

拦路的女妖被我们击退了 继续前进!.Translation: The blocking witch has been repelled by us, continue forward!

一位玩家习得圣愈魔法.Translation: A player has acquired Holy Healing Magic.

什么!?竟然无法通过...难道要命丧于此?坚定守住就有办法!.Translation: What!? We can't get through... Are we to perish here? If we hold firm, there must be a way!

真是命悬一线啊...不过到底发生了什么?.Translation: It's a matter of life and death... But what exactly happened?

圣骑士-你被拉姆萨引导而来，但是你有足够的力量去继承他的意志吗？.Translation: Holy Knight: You were guided here by Ramza, but do you have the strength to inherit his will?

圣骑士-生无常，命无怜，葬身之徒皆迷暗！不动无明剑！.Translation: Holy Knight: Life is impermanent, fate is merciless, all who perish are lost in darkness! Unmoving Sword of Ignorance!

圣骑士-上天之意铭刻于胸，空荡之魂杂念皆空！圣光爆裂破！.Translation: Holy Knight: The will of heaven is inscribed on my chest, the empty soul is free of distractions! Holy Light Explosion!

圣骑士-邪神乱清心，杂念生小人，唯有圣者净心化人！乱命割杀打！.Translation: Holy Knight: The evil god disrupts the mind, distractions give rise to petty people; only the holy can purify the heart! Chaotic Death Slash!

圣骑士-死兆之星七影断联，命运之络死亡侵残。北斗骨碎打！.Translation: Holy Knight: The Star of Death severed seven shadows, the web of fate is invaded by death. Big Dipper Bone Smash!

圣骑士-空中力量翻涌，地上敌人震惊，狂雷闪电皆汇聚手中！无双惊电突！.Translation: Holy Knight: Power surges in the air, enemies on the ground are stunned, wild lightning gathers in my hands! Unmatched Lightning Strike!

一位玩家习得烈焰魔法.Translation: A player has learned Fire Magic

妖灵王-啦啦啦~人类来和我一起玩吧!.Translation: Spirit King La La La~ Humans, come play with me!

可恶!不要在混乱魔法中乱了阵脚!.Translation: Damn! Don't lose your footing in the chaos magic!

捣乱的妖灵王已被击退,重整队形继续前进!.Translation: The troublesome Spirit King has been repelled. Regroup and continue forward!

一位玩家习得寒霜魔法.Translation: A player has learned frost magic

一位玩家习得抹除魔法.Translation: A player has learned erase magic
